justification: Vendor 3 fully meets the requirement by providing 'advanced 3D rendering capabilities... enabling real-time visualization of point cloud datasets, LiDAR scans, and 3D CAD models.' Integration is supported through 'REST APIs, Unity, Unreal Engine, and OpenGL/WebGL standards,' with format compatibility (OBJ, FBX, IFC, LAS) and compliance with relevant data security standards, directly supporting user-friendly interaction with large datasets as described in the Ability section.
